title: KR GRAPHICS
body: rito i have a question, is it ok if we have kr graphics/ voice overs on the NA servers, or is that not allowed for reasons?

replies.body: ZeroPhear, you will be okay using KR voiceovers.  I'm not quite sure what you mean by graphics though?

Why have people been banned in EUW for using Korean voice?

Why do your international teams not follow the same rules as NA?

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/43j8u5/ok_so_apparently_you_can_get_ban_by_changing_your/

(This happened months ago btw)

by graphics i mean things look smoother in my opinion when you change to the kr version on the NA servers.  For example, the player names seem thinner in the kr version, while the NA versions seem bolder, also in my opinion i think the gameplay is smoother when you switch to the kr graphics, but ty for answering me! :D if you dont understand me then please watch this video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2r6dLIv9m2c he explains it alot better then me
video isnt available anymore, is there any way to change to kr graphics, im on NA server
